name: Hellevator (itch) (EdSlee, TimKashani, Avery Baker, Zoi, bhsueh123, DragonTamer13)
name_original: Hellevator (itch) (EdSlee, TimKashani, Avery Baker, Zoi, bhsueh123, DragonTamer13)
description: Hellevator is a horror game that uses uncanniness and different media to discomfort and frighten the player. This game is both singleplayer and online multiplayer. Both modes are essentially the same with the difficulty slightly increased in multiplayer. This game contains flashing lights and jumpscares, so player discretion is advised.
